Name: Intesar
description:
Intesar is a wonderful hardworking woman who tries her utmost to provide her family with a decent life. She is a 30-year-old mother of four adorable kids, living with her family in a village near Jenin, West Bank.

Her husband works in farming, and she works in breeding livestock in order to help with the living expenses. She turned to Palestine for Credit and Development (FATEN) to request a loan to buy more livestock and fodder for her work. This will improve her production and enhance her family's living standards. She hopes you will help by funding her loan.
